title: John Oliver: ‘Everyone knew the administration had it in for Kimmel’
description: Last Week Tonight host spoke about Jimmy Kimmel’s suspension and why we should be worried about what this means for the US
content:
John Oliver has voiced his concern for the suspension of Jimmy Kimmel’s show and his support of his fellow late-night TV host.

title: Nigel Farage roundly condemned over plan to abolish indefinite leave to remain
description: Cross-party criticism after Reform UK leader threatens hundreds of thousands of legal immigrants with deportation
content:
Nigel Farage has faced cross-party condemnation after threatening hundreds of thousands of legal immigrants with deportation by pledging to abolish the main route towards permanent settlement in the UK.

title: Bodycare to shut remaining stores with loss of 444 jobs
description: Administrators say the business is "no longer viable to continue" trading and a sale is "unlikely".
content:
All remaining Bodycare stores are to close with the loss of 444 jobs after the health and beauty chain's administrators failed to find a buyer for the shops.
The business, which fell into administration earlier this month, was "no longer viable to co... [2804 chars]
